description:
This Weapon Pack is included in the Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Collection 1 Pack. Check it out for the best way to complete your fleet!*

Iron Fist launches short-range shrapnel bursts to devastate your enemies. 

Freeze Ray Mk. 2 charges and releases a high-precision laser that encases targets in ice.

*Starlink: Battle For Atlas game required to play. 

The Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Iron Fist Weapon Pack* includes: 
-One digital Iron Fist Weapon
-One digital Freeze Ray Mk. 2 Weapon Harness the powers of frost and kinetic weapons to gain the advantage in battle. 

*This pack is included in the Digital and Deluxe Editions of Starlink: Battle for Atlas™.
name: Starlink: Battle for Atlas™ Digital Iron Fist Weapon Pack
